price: 7. Tokkel ginoh inkih addunyal usun abba heen taamoomi keenih maaqennooh warsenno Ni-ixxigal, ken caaloota nek Qellittuh nanu aliat keenik masuginnino iyye Yalli.
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
